short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help to update Field level access and apex class access in salesforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension help you to provide field level access and Apex class access to profile and permissionSet in salesforce. You can give access to individual/bulk profile and permissionSet.
